last_episode_to_air.overview: As Jake and Katagiri close in on a crucial piece of evidence for their case, Sato prepares for the greatest power move of his life.
last_episode_to_air.name: Endgame

name: Tokyo Vice
overview: A first-hand account of the Tokyo Metropolitan Police beat following Jake Adelstein, an American journalist who embeds himself into the Tokyo Vice police squad to reveal corruption. Based on Jake Adelstein’s non-fiction book of the same name.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Season two takes us deeper into the city’s criminal underworld as Adelstein comes to realize that his life, and the lives of those close to him, are in terrible danger.

tagline: Find the truth, no matter the cost.

episodes.name: The Test
episodes.overview: Hired as Meicho Shimbun’s first American crime reporter, Jake Adelstein is quickly tasked with covering two cases that initially appear unrelated, but soon stakes his career – and life – on connecting the dots.

episodes.name: Kishi Kaisei
episodes.overview: As crime boss Tozawa dangerously toes the line between territories, the rival Chihara-Kai scramble to collect dues. Samantha protects another hostess, while Jake witnesses a confrontation that changes everything.

episodes.name: Read the Air
episodes.overview: Jake’s persistence pays off when he receives an exclusive from Detective Katagiri – but catches the less ideal eye of someone else in the process. Meanwhile, Samantha hits it off with a new customer, as Sato chooses between words and fists.

episodes.name: I Want It That Way
episodes.overview: As Samantha makes strides toward the future, her past catches up. With help from Emi, Tin-Tin, and Trendy, Jake has a breakthrough in connecting the cases - and comes face-to-face with the head of Chihari-Kai, who requires a favor.

episodes.name: Everybody Pays
episodes.overview: When Jake helps reveal the mole in Chihara-Kai, he must weigh the risks of accepting a favor in return from Ishida. Samantha attempts to take care of her Matsuo problem. Sato’s recruitment ends with a devastating lesson in loyalty.

episodes.name: The Information Business
episodes.overview: An impromptu Yakuza Peace Summit finds Tozawa at the mercy of his own actions. Samantha begins to settle her debts with Matsuo. A determined Jake chases down a tip from Ishida.

episodes.name: Sometimes They Disappear
episodes.overview: Jake struggles to regain his footing after the botched raid, while Samantha grows increasingly desperate to find Polina. Sato feels the pressure of his elevated standing in Chihari-Kai.

episodes.name: Yoshino
episodes.overview: While Samantha risks it all for Polina’s safe return, Sato is forced to mix business with pleasure. As Katagiri devises a plan to finally take down Tozawa, Jake is confronted by the crime boss’s men.

episodes.name: Don't Ever F**king Miss
episodes.overview: As Jake, Katagiri and Samantha pursue the truth about Polina, Sato clings to life – but not all of Chihara-kai are hoping for his full recovery.

episodes.name: Be My Number One
episodes.overview: As Jake and Katagiri seek new meaning at work, Samantha confronts a thief in her club, and Chihara-kai welcome a returning member.

episodes.name: Old Law, New Twist
episodes.overview: Katagiri and Nagata ramp up their efforts. Jake gets invited to an exclusive party. Samantha and Sato deal with a growing problem at the club.

episodes.name: Like a New Man
episodes.overview: As the new yakuza task force takes off, Ishida calls a summit. While Sato and Hayama join forces, Katagiri and Jake investigate a mysterious return.

episodes.name: Illness of the Trade
episodes.overview: After a disastrous setback, Sato and Hayama strategize a way forward. Jake and Katagiri pursue their target – and try not to land in his crosshairs.

episodes.name: I Choose You
episodes.overview: Chihara-kai attempt to regroup after a devastating shootout. Jake, Katagiri, and Nagata pursue a tip from Samantha.

episodes.name: The War at Home
episodes.overview: A death at Chihara-kai causes upheaval. Jake makes a long overdue visit home. Katagiri hopes a perp will help break his case wide open.

episodes.name: The Noble Path
episodes.overview: Jake’s successful trip to the U.S. propels the group in a new direction, while Katagiri struggles with his case’s devastating turn of events.

episodes.name: Consequences
episodes.overview: Sato considers the future of Chihara-kai, while Jake and Katagiri inch closer to exposing the truth about Tozawa.

episodes.name: Endgame
episodes.overview: As Jake and Katagiri close in on a crucial piece of evidence for their case, Sato prepares for the greatest power move of his life.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Season two takes us deeper into the city’s criminal underworld as Adelstein comes to realize that his life, and the lives of those close to him, are in terrible danger.
